name: ProjectStarZoo
description:
Baa, baa.

The space boat crashed oh no !

Take your Grabbity Gun and rescue the fluffs !

TAB - menu / controls

controller buttons don't all work, some bug in GC2, ah well.

if the mouse controls are wierd, try going full screen.... itch is being naughty with locked mouse

windows executable for great victory (recommended)

~40 hours total

Unity 2021.3.2f1

Assets

GC2 - core only

Creepy Cat scifi packs 1, 2 and 3

amplify shader editor

mesh combine studio 2

nebula skyboxes

suiriyun Mego Pet Zoo Bundle

project asset manager

heirarchy2

--

various audio from my sound library

asteroids and rescue pod custom BunnyViking exclusive

player controller and grabbity gun custom c#

for everything else there's GC2 (most UI, environmental interractions, rescue pod actions, environmental audio)
